product.text:
The Penguin that Hated the Cold

Your child is sure to enjoy the adventures of Pablo, a penguin who follows his dreams to find his niche in the world. Pablo quickly realizes that his dislike for the cold sets him apart from the rest of the penguins. Rather than moping over his inability to fit in or settling for a life of discomfort, he heads north in search of a warmer climate. Though Pablo encounters snafus on his travels, he soon finds a tropical island home where he can live happily ever after.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to share her aspirations or dreams, then brainstorm for ideas that will help her accomplish them. Share a few of your own goals, and illustrate the means you utilized to accomplish them.
